member.name: T:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility
member.summary: Provides cryptographic service.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.AesDecrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts the cipher text by using the AES encryption algorithm.
member.param: The raw data of cipher text.
member.returns: The raw data of plain text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.AesDecrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts the cipher text by using the AES encryption algorithm.
member.returns: The plain text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.AesEncrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypts the plain text by using the AES encryption algorithm.
member.param: The raw data of plain text.
member.returns: The raw data of cipher text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.AesEncrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts the plain text by using the AES encryption algorithm.
member.returns: The cipher text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.GenerateRandomKey(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates the random key data for encryption.
member.param: if set to true [include lowercase characters].
if set to true [include uppercase characters].
if set to true [include special characters].
member.returns: The key data for encryption.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.GenerateRandomKeyString(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Generates the random key string for encryption, which is original plain text that encoding by UTF-8.
member.param: if set to true [include lowercase characters].
if set to true [include uppercase characters].
if set to true [include special characters].
member.returns: The key string for encryption, which is original plain text that encoding by UTF-8.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.Md5Encrypt(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encrypts the plain text by using the MD5 encryption algorithm. The length of the cipher text is 16.
member.param: if set to true [output cipher text as lower case].
member.returns: The cipher text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.Md5Encrypt(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypts the raw data of plain text by using the MD5 encryption algorithm.
member.param: The raw data of plain text.
member.returns: The raw data of cipher text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.Md5HashEncrypt(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Encrypts the plain text by using the MD5 Hash encryption algorithm. The length of cipher text is 32.
member.param: if set to true [output cipher text as lower case].
member.returns: The cipher text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.Md5HashEncrypt(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypts the raw data of plain text by using the MD5 Hash encryption algorithm.
member.param: The raw data of plain text.
member.returns: The raw data of cipher text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.XxteaDecrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts the cipher text by using the XXTEA encryption algorithm.
member.returns: The plain text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.XxteaDecrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Decrypts the raw data of cipher text by using the XXTEA encryption algorithm.
member.param: The raw data of cipher text.
member.returns: The raw data of plain text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.XxteaEncrypt(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts the plain text by using the XXTEA encryption algorithm.
member.returns: The cipher text.

member.name: M:ReSharp.Security.Cryptography.CryptoUtility.XxteaEncrypt(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encrypts the raw data of plain text by using the XXTEA encryption algorithm.
member.param: The raw da of plain text.
member.returns: The raw data of cipher text.
